ABOUT THIS NEW SOUNDTRACK:
We offer here an alternative to the score chosen by Cohen Film Coll. (by Carl Davis), as we believe that the movie deserves musical compositions of the greatest calibre, as well as honoring the 'silents' custom of always quoting from the classical repertory.
